LocalizationFile.Locales:
playergang_default_name Player's Gang
notify_created_gang_for_player Created new gang for the player!
test_locale locale test: yes, it works
notify_enemy_gang_creation_failed Enemy gang creation failed: bad/empty/not found memberPool file. Try adding peds as potential members for AI gangs
notify_gang_x_has_entered The {0} have entered San Andreas!
notify_gang_x_wiped_out The {0} have been wiped out!
notify_money_won_from_zones Money won from controlled zones:
subtitle_must_wait_before_parachuting_backup_again You must wait before calling for parachuting backup again! (This is configurable)
subtitle_too_many_members_around_or_no_member_registered There are too many gang members around or you haven't registered any member.
subtitle_must_control_territory_to_call_backup You need to have control of at least one territory in order to call for backup.
subtitle_need_x_to_call_parachuting You need ${0} to call a parachuting member!
subtitle_must_wait_before_car_backup_again You must wait before calling for car backup again! (This is configurable)
subtitle_vehicle_on_its_way A vehicle is on its way!
subtitle_too_many_members_around_or_no_member_or_car_registered There are too many gang members around or you haven't registered any member or car.
subtitle_need_x_to_call_vehicle_backup You need ${0} to call a vehicle!
notify_freemodemember_attempted_face_blending_invalid_ped_type attempted face blending for invalid ped type:
notify_warn_bad_memberpool_file GTA5GangNTurfMod Warning: empty/bad memberpool file! Enemy gangs won't spawn
notify_failed_find_pot_member_style_x_color_y failed to find a potential member of style {0} and color {1}
notify_warn_bad_carpool_file GTA5GangNTurfMod Warning: empty/bad carpool file! Enemy gangs won't have cars
notify_the_x_have_taken_y The {0} have taken {1}!
notify_the_x_have_taken_y_from_the_z The {0} have taken {1} from the {2}!
subtitle_member_was_arrested Your member has been arrested!
blip_last_used_protagonist Last Used Protagonist
subtitle_potential_spawn_removed Potential Spawn Removed!
subtitle_potential_spawn_added Potential Spawn Added!
notify_car_told_to_backup Car told to back you up!
subtitle_member_joined_your_group A member has joined your group
subtitle_member_left_your_group A member has left your group
notify_mod_abort_removing_blips Gang and Turf mod: removing blips. If you didn't press Insert, please check your log and report any errors.
subtitle_key_cannot_be_used_due_to_conflicts That key can't be used because some settings would become unaccessible due to conflicts.
subtitle_key_already_being_used_by_mod That key is already being used by this mod's commands.
subtitle_key_was_changed Key changed!
menu_title_mod_name Gang and Turf Mod
menu_subtitle_mod_name Main Menu
menu_button_call_backup_vehicle_cost_x Call Backup Vehicle (${0})
menu_button_desc_call_backup_vehicle Calls one of your gang's vehicles to your position. The driver will leave the vehicle once it arrives.
menu_button_call_parachuting_member_cost_x Call Parachuting Member (${0})
menu_button_desc_call_parachuting_member Calls a gang member who parachutes to your position (member survival not guaranteed!).
blip_member_of_gang_x {0} member
menu_button_war_options War Options...
menu_button_desc_war_options Opens the War Menu, containing options useful in a Gang War.
menu_button_gang_customization_upgrades Gang Customization/Upgrades...
menu_button_desc_gang_customization_upgrades Opens the Gang Customization and Upgrades menu.
menu_button_mod_options Mod Options...
menu_button_desc_mod_options Opens the Mod Options Menu, which allows various configurations of the mod to be tweaked. Options not found in this menu can only be tweaked directly in the ModOptions.xml file.
menu_button_spawn_enemy_backup_vehicle Spawn Enemy Backup Vehicle
menu_button_desc_spawn_enemy_backup_vehicle Spawns a vehicle of the target AI gang, attempting to reach your location.
menu_subtitle_select_gang_spawn_vehicle Select gang from which to spawn a vehicle
subtitle_vehicle_spawned Vehicle spawned!
subtitle_too_many_members_around_or_picked_gang_has_no_vehicles_members There are too many gang members around or the picked gang has no vehicles/members registered.
mod_menu_title_gang_blip_color Gang Blip Color
menu_button_desc_gang_blip_color The color change can be seen immediately on turf blips. Click or press enter after selecting a color to save the color change.
mod_menu_title_gang_weapons Gang Weapons
subtitle_gang_weapon_removed Weapon Removed!
subtitle_gang_weapon_bought Weapon Bought!
subtitle_not_enough_money_to_buy_gang_weapon You don't have enough money to buy that weapon for your gang.
mod_menu_title_key_bindings Key Bindings
menu_button_set_keybinding_gang_control Gang Control Key
menu_button_set_keybinding_gang_control_desc The key used to open the Gang/Mod Menu. Used with shift to open the Member Registration Menu. Default is B.
menu_button_set_keybinding_zone_control Zone Control Key
menu_button_set_keybinding_zone_control_desc The key used to check the current zone's name and ownership. Used with shift to open the Zone Menu and with control to toggle zone blip display modes. Default is N.
menu_button_set_keybinding_add_remove_member_from_group Add or Remove Member from Group
menu_button_set_keybinding_add_remove_member_from_group_desc The key used to add/remove the targeted friendly gang member to/from your group. Members of your group will follow you. Default is H.
menu_button_set_keybinding_mind_control Take Control of Member
menu_button_set_keybinding_mind_control_desc The key used to take control of the targeted friendly gang member. Pressing this key while already in control of a member and not aiming at another will restore protagonist control. Default is J.
subtitle_press_new_keybinding_for_command Press the new key for this command.
mod_menu_title_modoptions_submenu_main Mod Options
menu_toggle_modoption_notificationsEnabled Notifications enabled?
menu_toggle_modoption_notificationsEnabled_desc Enables/disables the displaying of messages whenever a gang takes over a zone.
menu_toggle_modoption_ambientSpawningEnabled Ambient member spawning?
menu_toggle_modoption_ambientSpawningEnabled_desc If enabled, members from the gang which owns the zone you are in will spawn once in a while. This option does not affect member spawning via backup calls or gang wars.
menu_toggle_modoption_ignoreTurfOwnershipWhenAmbientSpawning Ambient spawning: random gangs
menu_toggle_modoption_ignoreTurfOwnershipWhenAmbientSpawning_desc If enabled, ambient spawning will spawn members from any gang instead of only from the one which owns the zone you are in. This option does not affect member spawning via backup calls or gang wars.
menu_toggle_modoption_preventAIExpansion Prevent AI Gangs' Expansion?
menu_toggle_modoption_preventAIExpansion_desc If checked, AI Gangs won't start wars or take neutral zones.
menu_toggle_modoption_showGangMemberBlips Show Member and Car Blips?
menu_toggle_modoption_showGangMemberBlips_desc If disabled, members and cars won't spawn with blips attached to them. (This option only affects those that spawn after the option is set)
menu_toggle_modoption_membersSpawnWithMeleeOnly Gang members use melee weapons only?
menu_toggle_modoption_membersSpawnWithMeleeOnly_desc If checked, all gang members will spawn with melee weapons only, even if they purchase firearms or are set to start with pistols.
menu_toggle_modoption_warAgainstPlayerEnabled Enemy gangs can attack your turf?
menu_toggle_modoption_warAgainstPlayerEnabled_desc If unchecked, enemy gangs won't start a war against you, but you will still be able to start a war against them.
menu_toggle_modoption_forceSpawnCars Backup cars can teleport to always arrive?
menu_toggle_modoption_forceSpawnCars_desc If enabled, backup cars, after taking too long to get to the player, will teleport close by. This will only affect friendly vehicles.
menu_toggle_modoption_gangsStartWithPistols Gangs start with Pistols?
menu_toggle_modoption_gangsStartWithPistols_desc If checked, all gangs, except the player's, will start with pistols. Pistols will not be given to gangs already in town.
menu_toggle_modoption_joypadControls Use joypad controls?
menu_toggle_modoption_joypadControls_desc Enables/disables the use of joypad commands to recruit members (pad right), call backup (pad left) and output zone info (pad up). Commands are used while aiming. All credit goes to zixum.
subtitle_joypad_controls_activated Joypad controls activated. Remember to disable them when not using a joypad, as it is possible to use the commands with mouse/keyboard as well
menu_toggle_modoption_protagonistsAreSpectators Player Is a Spectator
menu_toggle_modoption_protagonistsAreSpectators_desc If enabled, all gangs should ignore the player, even during wars.
menu_button_open_key_bindings Key Bindings...
menu_button_open_key_bindings_desc Opens the Key Bindings Menu, which allows setting which keys are linked to this mod's commands.
menu_button_force_run_update_ai_gangs Run an Update on all AI Gangs
menu_button_force_run_update_ai_gangs_desc Makes all AI Gangs try to upgrade themselves and/or invade other territories immediately. Their normal updates, which happen from time to time (configurable in the ModOptions file), will still happen normally after this.
menu_button_force_ai_gang_attack_this_zone Force an AI Gang to Attack this zone
menu_button_force_ai_gang_attack_this_zone_desc If you control the current zone, makes a random AI Gang attack it, starting a war. The AI gang won't spend money to make this attack.
subtitle_couldnt_start_forced_war Couldn't start a war. Is a war already in progress in this zone?
subtitle_zone_you_in_not_controlled_by_your_gang The zone you are in is not controlled by your gang.
subtitle_zone_you_in_not_takeable The zone you are in has not been marked as takeable.
subtitle_no_enemy_gangs_exist There aren't any enemy gangs in San Andreas!
menu_button_reload_modoptions Reload Mod Options
menu_button_reload_modoptions_desc Reload the settings defined by the ModOptions file. Use this if you tweaked the ModOptions file while playing for its new settings to take effect.
menu_button_reset_weapon_list_prices Reset Weapon List and Prices to Defaults
menu_button_reset_weapon_list_prices_desc Resets the weapon list in the ModOptions file back to the default values. The new options take effect immediately.
menu_button_reset_modoptions Reset Mod Options to Defaults
menu_button_reset_modoptions_desc Resets all the options in the ModOptions file back to the default values (except the possible gang first and last names). The new options take effect immediately.
mod_menu_title_gang_car_colors Gang Car Colors
mod_menu_title_car_colors_list Car Colors List
menu_button_customize_primary_car_color Customize Primary Car Color
menu_button_customize_secondary_car_color Customize Secondary Car Color
subtitle_gang_vehicle_color_changed Gang vehicle color changed!
menu_button_pick_car_color_desc Colors can be previewed if you are inside a vehicle. Click or press enter to confirm the gang color change.
mod_menu_title_gang_customize Gang Customization/Upgrades
menu_button_rename_gang Rename Gang
menu_button_rename_gang_desc Opens the input prompt for resetting your gang's name.
subtitle_your_gang_now_known_as_the_ Your gang is now known as the
subtitle_name_not_allowed That name is not allowed, sorry! (It may be in use already)
menu_button_submenu_gang_upgrades Gang Upgrades...
menu_button_submenu_gang_upgrades_desc Opens the Gang Upgrades menu, where it's possible to upgrade your members' attributes and general gang strength.
menu_button_submenu_gang_weapons Gang Weapons...
menu_button_submenu_gang_weapons_desc Opens the Gang Weapons menu, where it's possible to purchase and sell weapons used by your gang members.
menu_button_submenu_gang_car_colors Gang Car Colors...
menu_button_submenu_gang_car_colors_desc Opens the Gang Car Colors menu, where it's possible to change the colors of your gang vehicles.
menu_button_submenu_gang_blip_color Gang Blip Color...
menu_button_submenu_gang_blip_color_desc Opens the Gang Blip Color menu, where it's possible to change the color of your gang blips (members, vehicles and turf).
mod_menu_title_pick_ai_gang Pick Ai Gang Menu
subtitle_selected_gang_not_found The gang selected could not be found! Has it been wiped out or renamed?
mod_menu_title_war_options War Options
menu_button_skip_current_war Skip current War
menu_button_skip_current_war_desc If a war is currently occurring, it will instantly end, and its outcome will be defined by the strength and reinforcements of the involved gangs and a touch of randomness.
menu_toggle_modoption_showReinforcementCountsForAIWars Show reinforcement counts for AI Wars
menu_toggle_modoption_showReinforcementCountsForAIWars_desc If enabled, reinforcement counts will also be shown when inside a war the player's gang is not involved in.
menu_toggle_modoption_lockCurWarReinforcementCount Lock current war reinforcement count
menu_toggle_modoption_lockCurWarReinforcementCount_desc If enabled, reinforcement counts of the current war will never drop, making the war never end. This doesn't affect auto-resolution of distant wars.
subtitle_no_war_in_progress_here There is no war in progress here.
menu_button_submenu_war_potential_spawns War Potential Spawns...
menu_button_submenu_war_potential_spawns_desc Opens the War Potential Spawns Menu, which allows viewing, creating and deleting spawns to be used in wars.
mod_menu_title_war_potential_spawns War Potential Spawns Menu
menu_button_show_pot_spawns_on_map Show spawns on map
menu_button_show_pot_spawns_on_map_desc For debugging purposes. If enabled, the nearest spawns will be marked with blips on the map.
menu_button_add_pot_spawn_here Add New Potential Spawn Here
menu_button_add_pot_spawn_here_desc Adds a new position to be used as a spawn/control point in Gang Wars. You must be on the ground for the spawn to work correctly!
menu_button_remove_nearby_pot_spawn Remove Nearby Spawn
menu_button_remove_nearby_pot_spawn_desc The first spawn found nearby will be deleted from the potential spawns.
subtitle_must_be_on_ground_add_pot_spawn You must be on the ground to add a potential spawn!
subtitle_pot_spawn_added Potential spawn added!
subtitle_another_pot_spawn_too_close There's another spawn too close to this one!
subtitle_pot_spawn_removed Potential spawn removed!
subtitle_no_pot_spawn_nearby Couldn't find a potential spawn nearby! Try getting closer.
mod_menu_title_gang_upgrades Gang Upgrades
menu_button_upgrade_member_health Upgrade Member Health
menu_button_upgrade_member_health_desc Increases gang member starting and maximum health. The cost increases with the amount of upgrades made. The limit is configurable via the ModOptions file.
menu_button_upgrade_member_armor Upgrade Member Armor
menu_button_upgrade_member_armor_desc Increases gang member starting body armor. The cost increases with the amount of upgrades made. The limit is configurable via the ModOptions file.
menu_button_upgrade_member_accuracy Upgrade Member Accuracy
menu_button_upgrade_member_accuracy_desc Increases gang member firing accuracy. The cost increases with the amount of upgrades made. The limit is configurable via the ModOptions file.
menu_button_upgrade_gang_base_strength Upgrade Gang Base Strength
menu_button_upgrade_gang_base_strength_desc Increases the level territories have after you take them. This level affects the income provided, the reinforcements available in a war and reduces general police presence. The limit is configurable via the ModOptions file.
subtitle_member_health_upgraded Member health upgraded!
subtitle_member_health_maxed_configurable Your members' health is at its maximum limit (it can be configured in the ModOptions file)
subtitle_not_enough_money_for_upgrade You don't have enough money to buy that upgrade.
subtitle_member_armor_upgraded Member armor upgraded!
subtitle_member_health_maxed_configurable Your members' armor is at its maximum limit (it can be configured in the ModOptions file)
subtitle_member_accuracy_upgraded Member accuracy upgraded!
subtitle_member_accuracy_maxed_configurable Your members' accuracy is at its maximum limit (it can be configured in the ModOptions file)
subtitle_gang_strength_upgraded Gang Base Strength upgraded!
subtitle_gang_strength_maxed_configurable Your Gang Base Strength is at its maximum limit (it can be configured in the ModOptions file)
mod_menu_title_member_registration Gang Member Registration Controls
mod_menu_title_vehicle_registration Gang Vehicle Registration Controls
subtitle_ped_selected ped selected!
subtitle_couldnt_find_ped_in_front_selected_self Couldn't find a ped in front of you! You have selected yourself.
subtitle_vehicle_selected vehicle selected!
member_color_white White
member_color_black Black
member_color_red Red
member_color_green Green
member_color_blue Blue
member_color_yellow Yellow
member_color_gray Gray
member_color_pink Pink
member_color_purple Purple
member_style_business Business
member_style_street Street
member_style_beach Beach
member_style_special Special
menu_listitem_member_style Member Dressing Style
menu_listitem_member_style_desc The way the selected member is dressed. Used by the AI when picking members (if the AI gang's chosen style is the same as this member's, it may choose this member).
menu_listitem_member_color Member Color
menu_listitem_member_color_desc The color the member will be assigned to. Used by the AI when picking members (if the AI gang's color is the same as this member's, it may choose this member).
menu_toggle_extended_member_registration Extended Save Mode
menu_toggle_extended_member_registration_desc If enabled, saves all clothing indexes for non-freemode peds. Can help with some addon peds.
menu_button_save_pot_member_for_ai_gangs Save Potential Member for future AI gangs
menu_button_save_pot_member_for_ai_gangs_desc Saves the selected ped as a potential gang member with the specified data. AI gangs will be able to choose him\\her.
subtitle_potential_freemode_member_added Potential freemode member added!
subtitle_similar_potential_member_exists A similar potential member already exists.
subtitle_potential_member_added Potential member added!
menu_button_save_member_to_your_gang Save ped type for your gang
menu_button_save_member_to_your_gang_desc Saves the selected ped type as a member of your gang, with the specified data. The selected ped himself won't be a member, however.
subtitle_your_gang_has_similar_member Your gang already has a similar member.
menu_button_save_member_for_specific_enemy_gang Save ped type for a specific enemy gang...
subtitle_that_gang_has_similar_member That gang already has a similar member.
menu_button_remove_member_respective_gang Remove ped type from respective gang
menu_button_remove_member_respective_gang_desc If the selected ped type was a member of a gang, it will no longer be. The selected ped himself will still be a member, however. This works for your own gang and for the enemies.
subtitle_ped_not_in_any_gang The ped doesn't seem to be in a gang.
subtitle_member_removed Member removed successfully!
menu_button_remove_member_all_gangs_pool Remove ped type from all gangs and pool
menu_button_remove_member_all_gangs_pool_desc Removes the ped type from all gangs and from the member pool, which means future gangs also won't try to use this type. The selected ped himself will still be a gang member, however.
subtitle_ped_removed_from_pool Ped type removed from pool! (It might not be the only similar ped in the pool)
subtitle_ped_not_in_pool Ped type not found in pool.
menu_button_make_ped_friendly_your_gang Make Ped friendly to your gang
menu_button_make_ped_friendly_your_gang_desc Makes the selected ped (and everyone from his group) and your gang become allies. Can't be used with cops or gangs from this mod! NOTE: this only lasts until scripts are loaded again
subtitle_cannot_make_member_friendly That ped is a gang member! Gang members cannot be marked as allies
subtitle_ped_group_is_now_friendly That ped's group is now an allied group!
subtitle_cannot_make_cop_friendly That ped is a cop! Cops cannot be marked as allies
menu_button_register_vehicle_ai_gangs Register Vehicle as usable by AI Gangs
menu_button_register_vehicle_ai_gangs_desc Makes the vehicle type you are driving become chooseable as one of the types used by AI gangs.
subtitle_vehicle_added_pool Vehicle added to pool!
subtitle_vehicle_already_in_pool That vehicle has already been added to the pool.
subtitle_not_inside_vehicle You are not inside a vehicle.
menu_button_register_vehicle_your_gang Register Vehicle for your Gang
menu_button_register_vehicle_your_gang_desc Makes the vehicle type you are driving become one of the default types used by your gang.
subtitle_vehicle_added_to_gang Gang vehicle added!
subtitle_vehicle_already_in_your_gang That vehicle is already registered for your gang.
menu_button_register_vehicle_specific_enemy_gang Register vehicle for a specific enemy gang...
subtitle_vehicle_already_in_that_gang That vehicle is already registered for that gang.
menu_button_remove_vehicle_from_your_gang Remove Vehicle Type from your Gang
menu_button_remove_vehicle_from_your_gang_desc Removes the vehicle type you are driving from the possible vehicle types for your gang.
subtitle_vehicle_removed Gang vehicle removed!
subtitle_vehicle_not_in_your_gang That vehicle is not registered for your gang.
menu_button_remove_vehicle_all_gangs_pool Remove Vehicle Type from all gangs and pool
menu_button_remove_vehicle_all_gangs_pool_desc Removes the vehicle type you are driving from the possible vehicle types for all gangs, including yours. Existing gangs will also stop using that car and get another one if needed.
subtitle_vehicle_removed_pool Vehicle type removed from pool!
subtitle_vehicle_not_in_pool Vehicle type not found in pool.
mod_menu_title_zone_controls Zone Controls
subtitle_zone_x_is_now_neutral {0} is now neutral again.
subtitle_your_gang_doesnt_own_this_zone Your gang does not own this zone.
^ menu_button_take_zone_cost_x_desc Makes the zone you are in become part of your gang's turf. If it's not controlled by any gang, it will instantly become yours for a price of ${0}. If it belongs to another gang, a battle will begin!
menu_button_upgrade_zone Upgrade current zone
menu_button_upgrade_zone_not_takeable_suffix (Not takeable)
menu_button_start_war_light_attack Light Attack
menu_button_start_war_medium_attack Medium Attack
menu_button_start_war_large_attack Large Attack
menu_button_start_war_massive_attack Massive Attack
zone_attack_submenu_main Gang War Attack Options
menu_button_custom_zones_menu Edit/Create Custom Zones...
menu_button_desc_custom_zones_menu Opens the Custom Zones Menu
menu_button_add_zone_to_takeables_set_blip_pos Add Current Zone to Takeables/Set Blip Position
menu_button_desc_add_zone_to_takeables_set_blip_pos Makes the zone you are in become takeable by gangs and/or sets your position as the zone's reference position (if toggled, this zone's blip will show here).
subtitle_zone_data_updated Zone Data Updated!
menu_listitem_member_aggressiveness Member Aggressiveness
menu_listitem_member_aggressiveness_desc This controls how aggressive members from all gangs will be. Very aggressive members will shoot at cops and other gangs on sight, aggressive members will shoot only at other gangs on sight and defensive members will only shoot when one of them is attacked or aimed at.
member_aggressiveness_level_very_aggressive V. Aggressive
member_aggressiveness_level_aggressive Aggressive
member_aggressiveness_level_defensive Defensive
